name: io.github.MasonChow/source-map-parser-mcp
description: Parse JavaScript error stack traces back to original source code using source maps

environment_variables.description: Context lines around error locations in source code
environment_variables.name: SOURCE_MAP_PARSER_CONTEXT_OFFSET_LINE

environment_variables.description: Maximum memory cache size in MB for source maps
environment_variables.name: SOURCE_MAP_PARSER_RESOURCE_CACHE_MAX_SIZE
